scripts.postinstall: npm run override-nodefy && (npm run build & npm run link-capnp & wait)
scripts.link-capnp: cd node && npm link && cd .. && npm link capnp-js
scripts.override-nodefy: cd node_modules/gulp-nodefy && rm -rf node_modules/nodefy && npm install popham/nodefy#circular_refs
scripts.test-prep: mkdir -p tmp && capnp compile -ojs:tmp --src-prefix=test test/testing.capnp && nodefy -o test/testing.capnp.d './tmp/testing.capnp.d/**/*.js'
